name: Duminex Invoice
author: Duminex

sections.description: With Duminex, quotation and invoicing are going to be much more organized and faster than ever before. Duminex is made for bringing a larger impact across your entire business operation with its distinctive tools solely designed for fundamental business processes like billing, quoting, and inventory and payment tracking.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Duminex Invoice plugin to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory.
  2. Activate the Duminex Invoice plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What are the main features of Duminex?

Duminex deals with easing the difficulties in regular business operations. Creating quotations, invoicing and applying the same invoicing multiple times, keeping track of inventory count and notifying when the inventory gets lower, and using input business and customer data to compare and evaluate business performance are what primarily Duminex offers to its clients.

Are there any limits on invoice, inventory, or customer record counts in Duminex?

No. Duminex\’s highly powerful server ensures you store every record and maintain your customer profile and invoice history as much as you need. The database support is absolutely up-to-date to enable ease and smooth support to your day-to-day business.

Can Duminex help in improving business performance?

Absolutely yes. Duminex brings you powerful and up-to-date tools to analyze your business data, It offers you business intelligence tools to compare and analyze your past performance and predict the future forecast. Stock management largely helps you in lessening stock storage or achieving ideal stock cost by maintaining proper and timely stock. The customer database helps you decide which customer is profitable to retain and which one should be let go of.

Who should use Duminex?

Any small and middle size enterprise, or a manufacturer with wider business scope,, or wholesaler of customer goods can find a great deal of pleasure in using Duminex for their business. Any business looking for a well-organized invoicing system, any business facing problems in keeping timely track of inbound-outbound inventory, and any business serving a larger regular customer base should be at the first line in getting Duminex to ease their business operations.

Is it possible to include the previous customer profiles and invoice history in Duminex?

Absolutely yes. Duminex offers you a larger storage system with tools and options to include your previous data to bring more clarity and correctness in business analytics and trends comparison.

Are my data and information safe with Duminex?

Duminex does not compromise in the matter of safeguarding the confidential information of its clients. Our servers are absolutely free of harmful viruses and provide a strong firewall against any potential identity threat. The site is secured and only authorized ID can perform within the account.

Is Duminex accessible from a smartphone?

You don\’t really need to carry a laptop along with you every time. Any modern-day smartphone or tab is enough to operate your Dumienx account. Even in a remote area with sufficient internet services, Duminex is conveniently accessible to perform your important business function. The interface is designed in a user-friendly way keeping the smartphone option in consideration.

Is there any support available for any quesries or issues?

Yes. Duminex maintains a well-trained and specialized dedicated support team for taking care of customer issues. The team is reachable via mail or website in the quickest possible time and they are 24 hours available so that you don\’t have to wait for any resolution you may require.
